mapper.select: SELECT user_id ,passwd AS password ,user_nm ,email ,receive FROM auth_member WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND use_yn = #{useYn}
SELECT role_cd AS role FROM auth_member_role WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_member( user_id, passwd, user_nm, email, receive, use_yn, reg_date )VALUES( #{userId}, #{passwd}, #{userNm}, #{email}, #{receive}, 'Y', SYSDATE() )
INSERT INTO auth_member_role( user_id, role_cd, modify_dt )VALUES( #{userId}, #{roleCd}, SYSDATE() )
